Line1.1041B2: An outsider! I could use your help. A dying Knight mistook me for his confessor. He spoke of... sacrilegious things.
Line3.1041B2: He said his party of Knights found a secret to life eternal. A Red Chalice. Said the Bishop leading them ordered them to drink of it, deep.
Line7.1041B2: He confessed they shelter now in a place he called the Sanguine Chapel. The Chalice must be retrieved... and I must leave. Find me at the Bear Tribe camp when you have it.
